content: close the ring take a piece of black yarn and wrap it in the centre to form the body of a butterfly tie in a knot and leave two free ends - these will be antennae img 27 img 27 crochet pattern by mom cat s crafts kateryna kravchenko - @mom_cats_crafts this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern cannot be reproduced distributed or resold translated published or altered in any way 13 assembling 1 now dragon s eyes are tilt towards the outside to fix that you need to cut a long thread of green yarn and pass it through the inner corners of the eyes gently pull the yarn to straighten the eyes img 28 2 embroider the eyes with white yarn and the eyelashes with dark brown img 29 3 embroider mouth with black yarn img 30 img 28 img 29 img 30 4 sew the head to the body img 31 5 sew a leaf to the tail 6 embroider the claws on the paws with dark brown yarn img 32 7 place the paws and the tail in the appropriate places and secure them with pins if you are satisfied sew the paws and tail to the body img 33 img 31 img 32 img 33 crochet pattern by mom cat s crafts kateryna kravchenko - @mom_cats_crafts this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern cannot be reproduced distributed or resold translated published or altered in any way 14 8 to shape the ear skip one loop and pull the yarn through the next loop then sew the ears to the head between r11 and r12 14 stitches between them img 34-35 9 sew horns to the head on r11 5 stitches between them img 36 10 sew wings to the back 11 sew butterfly optional img 34 img 35 img 36 crochet pattern by mom cat s crafts kateryna kravchenko - @mom_cats_crafts this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern cannot be reproduced distributed or resold translated published or altered in any way 15 congratulations your leaf dragon is finished i would be happy to see your dragon if you are going to share your picture in instagram please don t forget to - tag me as an author by adding pattern by @mom_cats_crafts - use hashtag #momcatspatterns also you may sell finished handmade items made from this pattern as long as they were made by yourself in a limited number please give credit to mom cat s crafts as the pattern designer crochet pattern by mom cat s crafts kateryna kravchenko -
